p.s: The Dramadrama A Raisin in the Sun, written by Lorraine Hansberry and published in 1958 is about the black family Younger back then in the 60s to early 70s.
In the play the head of the family, grandmother Mama is about to receive a pay checkpaycheck over 10000$ because of the death of her husband.
In generallgeneral you can say that each family member, from old to young havehas an own personal dream, which could be more realistic with the money of the pay checkpaycheck.

So each of them has to express their dreams in front of Mama, who can decide on what she will spend the money, and tries to confinceconvince her that their dream is the right one, to spend the money on.
In the following text, I will briefly outline our given scene and contextualize it in act 1 of the drama.
First you can structure the given extract into three parts of paragraphs.
The first from line one to 15 is about that Walter Lee confronts Ruth another time with his dream of opening a liquor store.
The following discussion of them is about a friend of Walter Lee Willy Harris, which Ruth called a good-for-nothing loudmouth and further that Ruth doesn't really like the friends of her husband.
The next paragraph from line 10 to 25 is more about a monologue from Walter, within he tries to confinceconvince Ruth to have a talk with Mama about his dream spending the money on the liquor store.
He says that Mama would listen to Ruth more, than she would listen to him, while explaining things about the liquor store.

The last paragraph of our extract of the play, from line 26 to 43, is about ana closer explenationexplanation from Walter to his wife about the costs and the deal, he has figured out with his two friends, one named Willy and the othersother's name is Bobo.
He talks about the thirty thousand dollar deal, so that each of them havehas to spend exactly 10000$, which is exactly the amount, the pay ceckpaycheck of Mama would have.

In the last part of the third paragraph, the conflict between Ruth and Walter, because Ruth has to remember his husband that the money is not from him yet, so he should not hope and plan so passionately his dream come true.
